text: Why does he get surprised seeing Kassâ€™ new camera?
suggestion: Because he wants the camera too, and wonders how Kass made enough money to buy it.

text: How is Kass able to buy it but not Joey?
suggestion: Because she saved her allowance, created a plan, and earned enough money. Joey still has to work on his spending habits.

text: When Joey looks at his account, does he see any money to buy the things he wants?
